Package view.container

Class TinyGridLook

java.lang.Object
boardifier.view.ElementLook
boardifier.view.ContainerLook
boardifier.view.GridLook
view.container.TinyGridLook
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeroCardStackLook, MovementCardStackLook, PawnPotLook
public abstract class TinyGridLook extends GridLook
The TinyGridLook class represents a simplified grid look with tiny cell borders for visual representation of container elements. It provides a method to render the borders of the grid cells.

  • Constructor Details

    • TinyGridLook

      protected TinyGridLook(int rowHeight, int colWidth, ContainerElement containerElement)
      Constructs a new TinyGridLook with the specified row height, column width, and container element.
      Parameters:
      rowHeight - The height of each row in the grid.
      colWidth - The width of each column in the grid.
      containerElement - The container element associated with this grid look.
